entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 10.

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain mixed with snow. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain or snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 9 April 2023
